description:
Fudou Yukimitsu, who once belonged to Oda Nobunaga, can`t seem to get along with those at the citadel... And then another new sword, Kogarasumaru, appears and joins their cherry blossom viewing party.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: April: Because You`re Our Comrade in This Citadel
Uzuki: Kono Honmaru no Nakama Dakara Da
卯月 この本丸の仲間だからだ
